00020     void SimParticle::Clear(Option_t *option) {
00021         TObject::Clear();
00022 
00023         daughters_->Delete();
00024         parents_->Delete();
00025 
00026         energy_ = 0;
00027         pdgID_ = 0;
00028         genStatus_ = -1;
00029         time_ = 0;
00030         x_ = 0;
00031         y_ = 0;
00032         z_ = 0;
00033         endX_ = 0;
00034         endY_ = 0;
00035         endZ_ = 0;
00036         px_ = 0;
00037         py_ = 0;
00038         pz_ = 0;
00039         mass_ = 0;
00040         charge_ = 0;
00041     }
00042 
00043     void SimParticle::Print(Option_t *option) const {
00044         std::cout << "SimParticle { " <<
00045                 "energy: " << energy_ << ", " <<
00046                 "PDG ID: " << pdgID_ << ", " <<
00047                 "genStatus: " << genStatus_ << ", " <<
00048                 "time: " << time_ << ", " <<
00049                 "vertex: ( " << x_ << ", " << y_ << ", " << z_ << " ), " <<
00050                 "endPoint: ( " << endX_ << ", " << endY_ << ", " << endZ_ << " ), " <<
00051                 "momentum: ( " << px_ << ", " << py_ << ", " << pz_ << " ), " <<
00052                 "mass: " << mass_ << ", " <<
00053                 "nDaughters: " << daughters_->GetEntries() << ", "
00054                 "nParents: " << parents_->GetEntries() << ", "
00055                 "processType: " << processType_ <<
00056                 " }" << std::endl;
00057     }
